attributes.additional_details:
This bill goes directly against the will of the British people in the result of the previous EU referendum and will cause increased distrust amongst the public.

This bill is a threat to Brexit and to the democracy of this country. We must ensure the bill doesn’t pass in order for a proper Brexit to be delivered.
attributes.background: Yvette Cooper will produce a Brexit Bill to Parliament on Monday 21st January, which if passed will make MP’s decide between May’s deal or extending Article 50 in order to hold another referendum.
